casebody.data:
SUPREME COURT, APPELLATE TERM, FEBRUARY, 1898.

Before Beekman, P. J., Gildersleeve and Giegbrich, JJ.

Ferdinand Kerber, Respondent, v. Nathaniel Niles, Appellant. Appeal from, a judgment of the General Term of the City Court, affirming a judgment in favor of plaintiff entered upon a verdict, and from order denying motion for a new trial. Henry T. Brennan, for Appellant. Alfred and Charles Steckler, for Respondent.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
